## bobo make key

Create an encryption key of n length, default 32

### Synopsis

Creates an encrytion key of n length, the default length is 32.
	We use the crypto/rand package to get random numbers.

```
bobo make key [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help         help for key
  -n, --length int   key length (default 32)
```
